data.name: Coloring Pixels - Amusement Park Pack
data.detailed_description:
Amusement Park Book

This Amusement Park Book brings 20 new images to Coloring Pixels! Each image is of iconic amusement park scenes!

Grab some cotton candy or ride on your favourite park rides in this new book!

Contents

The Amusement Park book unlocks the following images:

  • Ticket Booth - 46x61
  • Magician - 55x70
  • Hot-Air Balloon - 55x87
  • Clown - 56x87
  • Helter Skelter - 58x125
  • Stilt Walker - 68x157
  • Rollercoaster - 75x75
  • Big Top - 85x85
  • Go-Karts - 92x43
  • Duck Targets - 100x26
  • Strong Man - 110x130
  • Cotton Candy - 113x127
  • Fairground at Dusk - 120x75
  • Fun House - 130x90
  • Fortune Teller - 135x135
  • Food Court - 139x29
  • Bouncy Castle - 140x110
  • Carnival Games - 185x125
  • Carousel - 187x185
  • Ferris Wheel - 300x190

data.short_description: This Amusement Park Book brings 20 new images to Coloring Pixels! Each image is of iconic amusement park scenes! Grab some cotton candy or ride on your favourite park rides in this new book!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 8.1
  • Processor: Intel i5
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX960
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i7 7700k
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX970
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: OSX 10.11
  • Processor: Intel i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated graphics
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated sound
